name: top_grossing_ios_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Fetch a list of the top grossing iOS apps from a specified country and category.

country.description: The country code for the App Store (default is 'us').

category.description: The category ID for the apps (default is '6016').

lang.description: The language code for the app descriptions (default is 'en').

num.description:
Number of results to return. 
Default: 50
Max: 200
